name: AppendTaskRunLogs
description:
Append log entries to a specific task run log array. 

This tool is used to add one or more log entries to the log array of a specified task run, identified by project, task, and run IDs.

parameters.name: task_run_uuid
parameters.description: A UUID string to identify the specific task run for log appending.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this task run.

parameters.name: project_identifier
parameters.description: ID of the project to access. Retrieve it by calling /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: task_run_task_id
parameters.description: A string representing the task ID for the task run. This identifies which task the logs are associated with.

parameters.name: log_entries
parameters.description: A JSON object containing an array of log entry dictionaries to append to the task run log.

entries.description: Array of log entry dictionaries to append

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this task run.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this task run.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

entries.description: Array of log entry dictionaries to append
